casebody.data:
In the Matter of RICHARD SWEETS, Inc., Alleged Bankrupt. In re Charles KARSH, Appellant. No. 82. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 6, 1936. Sol Klein, of New York City (Maurice Lefkort, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Edwin M. Slote and Jacob P. Shulman, both of New York City (Maxwell Slote, of New York City, on the brief), for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed in open court for lack of jurisdiction. '
